subsection.name: 1.1. Running CayenneModeler
subsection.p: CayenneModeler is a regular Java application and can be run on a JSDK1.4 compatible JVM. Main class is org.objectstyle.cayenne.modeler.Editor. For convenience Cayenne distribution provides run scripts to start modeler on Windows and UNIX platforms. To take advantage of these scripts, user must set CAYENNE_HOME (optional) and JAVA_HOME environment variables as described in the installation section.
